dblp.social.hibernate
Class SodaHibernateSessionImpl

java.lang.Object
  dblp.social.hibernate.SodaHibernateSessionImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
ISodaHibernateSession
public class SodaHibernateSessionImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements ISodaHibernateSession

This class wraps a Hibernate session and provides behaviour for making objects of Hibernate/ejb3-annotated classes persistent.

Author:
ghezzi

Constructor Detail

SodaHibernateSessionImpl

public SodaHibernateSessionImpl(java.lang.String dbUrl,
                                java.lang.String dbDialect,
                                java.lang.String dbDriverName,
                                java.lang.String dbUser,
                                java.lang.String dbPasswd,
                                SodaModelProvider modelProvider)
Constructor. Not intended to be called by clients directly. Use EvolizerSessionFactory#getCatalogSession(String, String, String, String, String) instead.

Parameters:
dbUrl - database host (e.g. mysql://localhost:3306/evolizer_test)
dbDialect - database dialect (e.g. org.hibernate.dialect.MySQLDialect)
dbDriverName - jdbc-compliant database driver (e.g. com.mysql.jdbc.Driver)
dbUser - database username
dbPasswd - database password for dbUser

configureDataBaseConnection

private void configureDataBaseConnection(java.lang.String dbUrl,
                                         java.lang.String dbDialect,
                                         java.lang.String dbDriverName,
                                         java.lang.String dbUser,
                                         java.lang.String dbPasswd)
Creates and stores the configuration for the Hibernate-session based on the passed parameters. Furthermore, it queries all org.evolizer.hibernate.modelProvider extensions for annotated classes.

Parameters:
dbUrl - database host (e.g. mysql://localhost:3306/evolizer_test)
dbDialect - database dialect (e.g. org.hibernate.dialect.MySQLDialect)
dbDriverName - jdbc-compliant database driver (e.g. com.mysql.jdbc.Driver)
dbUser - database username
dbPasswd - database password for dbUser

createSchema

public void createSchema()
                  throws SodaHibernateException
Description copied from interface: ISodaHibernateSession
Creates the database schema based on the o/r mappings (e.g. the Hibernate/ejb3-annotations). Can only be executed when session is closed.

Specified by:
createSchema in interface ISodaHibernateSession
Throws:
SodaHibernateException - if session IS active.

merge

public java.lang.Object merge(java.lang.Object object)
                       throws SodaHibernateException
Description copied from interface: ISodaHibernateSession
Merges the object. Useful during batch-processing where regular flushing/clearing is necessary due to memory restrictions. If e.g. ISodaHibernateSession.saveOrUpdate(Object) is invoked instead (at least while using Hibernate), we often experience exceptions.

Specified by:
merge in interface ISodaHibernateSession
Throws:
SodaHibernateException - if session is not open.
